title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Skills: A Job-Based Science Teaching and Learning Design Competency Enhancement Program

context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can utilize three or more job-based learning design frameworks applicable to real science education settings.
Learners can modify IMS-LD-based learning design tools to create science domain Work-Based Learning (WBL) scenarios.
Learners can develop a PBL activity plan that achieves over 80% learner engagement in university-corporate linked science education projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
